name: Warshade_Offensive.Umbral_Blast
display_help: Masters of the void, Warshades can manipulate dark energy, gravity and matter to blast and dominate their foes. The gravimetric nature of most Umbral Blast powers often slows the targets attack and movement speed.

powers.name: Warshade_Offensive.Umbral_Blast.Shadow_Bolt
powers.display_help: A very quick, but low damage attack that can lower your target's attack rate and movement speed. This power can be used while in Dwarf form, although only at a reduced range. While in dwarf form, this power will inflict a stronger attack and movement debuff, in addition to taunt its target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

powers.name: Warshade_Offensive.Umbral_Blast.Ebon_Eye
powers.display_help: You can emit a beam of dark energy from your eyes, dealing moderate Negative Energy damage. Ebon Eye can also slow your target's attack rate and movement speed. This power can be used while in Nova form at an increased range and with higher damage but slower recharge. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

powers.name: Warshade_Offensive.Umbral_Blast.Gravimetric_Snare
powers.display_help: You can hurl Gravimetric fibers to Snare your foes. Gravimetric Snare can Immobilize a single target and crush them. The target's attack rate and movement speed are also slowed, even if they resist the Immobilization effect. Damage: Moderate Damage over time, Recharge: Fast

display_info: 5 ticks of 4.45 negative energy damage over 9.2s on target
5 ticks of 4.45 smashing damage over 9.2s on target
5 ticks of 9.23 negative energy damage over 9.2s on target
5 ticks of 9.23 smashing damage over 9.2s on target
-20.00% strength to jump height, recharge for 6s on target
-20.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 6s on target

powers.name: Warshade_Offensive.Umbral_Blast.Dark_Nova
powers.display_help: Kheldians are masters of energy and matter. A Warshade can transform into a flying energy beast known as a Dark Nova. When you choose this power, you will have access to 4 very powerful ranged attacks that can only be used while in this form. You will not be able to use any other powers while in Dark Nova form. Dark Nova can fly, has an increased chance to hit and improved Endurance Recovery but has no defense. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 45.00% strength to smashing damage, negative energy damage for 2s on self
15.00% resistance to energy damage, negative energy damage for 2s on self

powers.name: Warshade_Offensive.Umbral_Blast.Dark_Nova_Bolt
powers.display_help: A very quick, but low damage attack that lowers your target's attack and movement speed. This power is only available while in Dark Nova Form. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: -20.00% strength to jump height, recharge for 3s on target
-20.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 3s on target

powers.name: Warshade_Offensive.Umbral_Blast.Dark_Nova_Blast
powers.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Dark Nova Bolt. Dark Nova Blast sends focused negative Nictus energy at a foe. This attack can knock down foes and will leave the targets' attack and movement speed slowed. This power is only available while in Dark Nova Form. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: -20.00% strength to jump height, recharge for 6s on target
-20.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 6s on target
10.00% chance for 1.9 magnitude knock on target
10.00% chance for 1.9 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Warshade_Offensive.Umbral_Blast.Dark_Nova_Emanation
powers.display_help: Sends bolts of Nictus dark energy to multiple targets at once within a cone area in front of the caster. Deals moderate negative energy damage to each affected foe and reduces their attack rate and movement speed. This power is only available while in Dark Nova Form. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 60 ft. radius 45° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: -20.00% strength to jump height, recharge for 8s on target
-20.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 8s on target

powers.name: Warshade_Offensive.Umbral_Blast.Dark_Nova_Detonation
powers.display_help: You hurl a blast of Dark Matter that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target. All affected targets' attack and movement speed are slowed. Some foes may be knocked down. This power is only available while in Dark Nova Form. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Negative), Foe Knockback, -Recharge, -SPD

display_info: 50.00% chance for 3.7 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Warshade_Offensive.Umbral_Blast.Shadow_Blast
powers.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Shadow Bolt. Shadow Blast sends focused negative Nictus energy at a foe. This attack can knock down foes and will leave the target's attack rate and movement speed slowed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

powers.name: Warshade_Offensive.Umbral_Blast.Starless_Step
powers.display_help: You can Teleport a single foe through a dark matter wormhole directly next to you. A successful hit must be made in order to Teleport the target, and some powerful foes cannot be Teleported. This power can be interrupted. Recharge: Slow

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

powers.name: Warshade_Offensive.Umbral_Blast.Sunless_Mire
powers.display_help: Sunless Mire can drain the essence of all nearby foes, thus increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your Damage and chance to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: PBAoE, Moderate DMG(Negative), Foe -Recharge, -SPD; Self +DMG, +To Hit

powers.display_help: You hurl a blast of Dark Matter that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target. All affected targets' have their attack rate and movement speed slowed. Some foes may be knocked down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Negative), Foe Knockback, -Recharge, -SPD

powers.name: Warshade_Offensive.Umbral_Blast.Gravity_Well
powers.display_help: Mastery over the forces of gravity and dark matter allows you to capture a single foe and crush them in a Gravity Well. The target is Held helpless, while he is crushed by the massive gravimetric forces. The target's attack rate and movement speed are also slowed, even if they resists the Hold effect. Damage: Superior(DoT), Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Warshade_Offensive.Umbral_Blast.Essence_Drain
powers.display_help: You tap the primal forces of your Nictus power to create an Essence Draining conduit between a foe and yourself. This will transfer Hit Points from your enemy to you. Foes drained in this manner have their attack rate and movement speed reduced. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info: -20.00% strength to jump height, recharge for 6s on target
-20.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 6s on target

powers.name: Warshade_Offensive.Umbral_Blast.Gravitic_Emanation
powers.display_help: Gravitic Emanation sends bolts of dark Nictus energy to multiple targets within a cone area in front of the caster. Gravitic Emanation deals only minor Negative Energy damage to each affected foe, but knocks them back, leaving them Disoriented and with reduced attack rate and movement speed. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Minor DMG(Negative), Foe Disorient, Knockback, -Recharge, -SPD

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 40 ft. radius 45° arc (10 targets max)

-20.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 10s on target

powers.name: Warshade_Offensive.Umbral_Blast.Unchain_Essence
powers.display_help: The Warshade can release the energy of a defeated foe and cause a massive Negative Energy explosion that can devastate any remaining foes. This power can only be activated by targeting a defeated foe. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE Special), Superior DMG(Negative), Foe Disorient, Knockback, -Recharge, -SPD

powers.name: Warshade_Offensive.Umbral_Blast.Dark_Extraction
powers.display_help: Defeated foes are ripe for the picking. A Warshade can extract the essence from a defeated villain and infuse it with Nictus energy. The extracted energy is an echo of the target's life force, and although it is not sentient, the infused Nictus energy does give it a rudimentary spark of life. Eventually, the extracted entity will fade away into nothingness. Recharge: Long

powers.name: Warshade_Offensive.Umbral_Blast.Quasar
powers.display_help: You can explode in a tremendous blast of Negative Energy, sending nearby foes flying. The Quasar deals massive damage to all nearby foes. Affected foes will be knocked down and their attack rate and movement speed will be slowed. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long

display_info: -30.00% strength to jump height, recharge for 20s on target
